sentences.en: Are all of my own wishful thinking and clumsy infatuated.
sentences.cn: 所有的都是我一厢情愿的痴情和笨拙.

sentences.en: Beijing University of Chinese Medicine will help you realize your wishful dream!
sentences.cn: 北京中医药大学帮你轻松圆梦!

sentences.en: Dr. Frend might call that wishful thinking.
sentences.cn: 弗洛伊德博士会把这叫做单凭主观愿望的想法.

sentences.en: He had, for the absolute briefest time , let wishful thinking about results overrule his scientific caution.
sentences.cn: 有那么一瞬间, 他对实验结果的一厢情景压倒了科学的谨慎.

sentences.en: Her wishful face haunts my dreams like the rain at night.
sentences.cn: 她的热切的脸,如夜雨似的,搅扰着我的梦魂.

sentences.en: I've got a feeling that Alex likes me, but that might just be wishful thinking.
sentences.cn: 我有一种感觉：亚历克斯喜欢我。但那可能只是我一相情愿的想法。

sentences.en: It is wishful thinking to expect deeper change under his leadership.
sentences.cn: 指望在他的领导下发生更深层次的变革简直是痴心妄想。

sentences.en: It's only his own wishful thinking.
sentences.cn: 这只是他自己一厢情愿.

sentences.en: Look to reality instead of relying on wishful thinking.
sentences.cn: 要着眼现实，而不要依赖一厢情愿的想法。

sentences.en: Prices seem to have stopped rising in the shops, or is that just wishful thinking on my part?
sentences.cn: 商店里东西的价格好像不再上涨了, 要不然就是我的一廂情愿?

sentences.en: Stop your wishful thinking and be glad for what you do have instead of always wanting more.
sentences.cn: 别再一厢情愿的妄想了，高高兴兴的接受你已经有的，别再奢求更多了。

sentences.en: Such wishful thinking of theirs will never be realized.
sentences.cn: 他们的那种痴心妄想永远也不会实现.

sentences.en: The personal computer might be seen as another example of this wishful alliance of the reversionary and technophiliac visions.
sentences.cn: 个人电脑可以被看作是另一个这种复古和技术狂愿景一厢情愿的联盟的例子。

sentences.en: This change in image is more than mere wishful thinking.
sentences.cn: 这种女性形象变化超过了她们的如意愿望.

sentences.en: This, I am sorry to say, is almost entirely wishful thinking.
sentences.cn: 我很遗憾，这几乎完全是一厢情愿的想法。

sentences.en: We rely on simple judgement or wishful thinking too often.
sentences.cn: 我们太多地依赖于简单判断和一厢情愿了.

sentences.en: Without possessing the necessary skills, strategic intent is merely wishful thinking.
sentences.cn: 如果不具备必要的技能, 战略意图只是美好的愿望.

words.tran_cn: 渴望地；希望地；不满足地
渴望的，愿望的；寄予希望的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 如意算盘；痴心妄想

trans.tran_cn: 怀有希望的，表达愿望的，单凭主观愿望的想法，一廂情愿
